## Data
We check data for each predictor variable. 
```{r}
summary_df <- data.frame(
  missing_values = colSums(is.na(data)),
  num_uni_value = sapply(data, function(x) length(unique(x))),
  uni_value = paste(lapply(data, unique), sep =",")
)
print(summary_df)
```
